snippet: Soldiers angry about the killing of an officer on Monday razed buildings and killed more than 30 people believed to be civilians in Maiduguri, a northeastern city.
abstract: Nigerian soldiers angry about killing of an officer raze buildings and kill more than 30 people in northeastern city of Maiduguri, spiritual home of radical Islamist sect Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Soldiers angry about the killing of an officer on Monday razed buildings and killed more than 30 people believed to be civilians in Maiduguri, a northeastern city.

headline.main: Nigeria: Soldiers Open Fire in City After Explosion
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Soldiers Open Fire in City After Explosion
